overview: Puneet Mehta’s drive to develop a sixth sense for navigating cities around the world led him to co-found MyCityWay. Before starting MyCityWay, Puneet held a number of technology executive positions with JP Morgan, Merrill Lynch and Citi Capital Markets, where he oversaw innovation, architecture and execution for newer technologies within capital markets, electronic trading and wealth management platforms. Today at MyCityWay, Puneet continues to focus the company’s efforts in being a one-stop shop for locals and tourists to explore their cities, using the best mobile, social and location-based technologies. Because MyCityWay offers global reach with hyperlocal marketing capabilities, the company’s popular apps provide the perfect platform for location- and intent-based targeted advertising. Whether a consumer is searching for a nearby coffee shop, retail location or specific type of restaurant, brands have the opportunity to present the consumer with relevant advertising for their nearby location. Puneet holds a BS in Engineering and Computer Science from Punjab Engineering College. When he is not busy changing the way we navigate cities at MyCityWay, you can find him navigating life in NYC as a yoga buff, foodie, and early stage investor.
